content.rendered:
Mr Throw is a game in which even an old teddy bear can become a deadly weapon! Calculate the strength and direction of the throw and throw at the enemy all the things that come to hand! Victory in this dangerous garbage battle!
The goal is to throw objects at your opponent and take away as much HP as possible.PC managementRight-click. Hold down the button and build the trajectory of the throw on the screen. Items for the throw are selected automatically.On a mobile deviceHold your finger on the screen and choose the trajectory of throwing an object at the enemy.An enemy object flying at you can be shot down with your own, if it turns out to be heavier or change the trajectory.
